name: Fate.exe
description:
This game (concept) was developed during Alarming Ladders' "Combat Jam".

Controls:

Press the continue button once you have selected one of the four possible 'actions' for each round of the game. You can skip a move by  not selecting an action before pressing the continue button.

Move Down 

Move Up 

Move Horizontal

Flip Horizontal Direction 

Attack / Use Sword  

Empty Action
